samples.name: Area Micro Chart
samples.description: Chart that displays the history of values and target values as segmented lines and shows thresholds as colored background. If you donâ€™t define a threshold, the background is transparent. You can insert labels showing information like dates and minimum and maximum values. You can set fixed horizontal and vertical scales.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart with Color Palette Lines
samples.description: The lines of the area micro chart are displayed in the colors defined by the colorPalette property.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart with Semantic Color Lines
samples.description: The AreaMicroChart control with lines that are displayed in semantic colors. This control replaces the deprecated sap.suite.ui.commons.MicroAreaChart.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart in Wide Mode
samples.description: The AreaMicroChart control in Wide mode. This control replaces the deprecated sap.suite.ui.commons.MicroAreaChart.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows different area micro chart types with responsive design comparing functionality for different dimensions.

samples.name: Area Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Shows a GenericTile including an area micro chart.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart
samples.description: Displays a colored horizontal bar representing a current value on top of a background bar representing the compared value. The vertical bars can represent the numeric values, the scaling factors, the thresholds, and the target values.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - Delta Mode
samples.description: Shows a BulletMicroChart control illustrating a delta value.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - No Forecast
samples.description: Shows the BulletMicroChart control without a forecast value defined.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - Transparent Scale
samples.description: Shows the BulletMicroChart control with transparent background bar. You can show or hide the markers to indicate individual data values. If no markers are shown, define the minValue and maxValue property to ensure that the values of multiple charts can be compared visually.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart on a GenericTile
samples.description: Shows the GenericTile including a bullet micro chart.

samples.name: Bullet Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows the BulletMicroChart control with responsive design.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart
samples.description: Displays values as bar charts with titles, numeric values, and scaling factors in the content area. The chart content is displayed in semantic colors. For the chart, you can specify a  fixed size or define that the chart adjusts to the screen size of the device.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart with Color Palette Lines
samples.description: The lines of the comparison micro chart are displayed in the colors defined by the colorPalette property.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart in Wide View
samples.description: The comparison micro chart can be displayed in wide mode.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart with Shrinkable Property Set to True
samples.description: If the Shrinkable property is set to true, the size of the chart is determined by its content.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart with Selectable Bars
samples.description: You can select individual bars in the Comparison Micro Chart.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Comparison Micro Chart within a GenericTile control.

samples.name: Comparison Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows the Comparison Micro Chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart
samples.description: Shows different column micro chart types comparing category values with the help of vertical bars.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows different column micro chart types with responsive design comparing functionality for different dimensions

samples.name: Column Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Shows the GenericTile including a column micro chart.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart with labels
samples.description: The ColumnMicroChart control with labels. This control replaces the deprecated sap.suite.ui.commons.ColumnMicroChart.

samples.name: Column Micro Chart with Selectable Columns
samples.description: You can select individual columns in the Column Micro Chart control. This control replaces the deprecated sap.suite.ui.commons.ColumnMicroChart.

samples.name: Delta Micro Chart
samples.description: Displays the delta of two values as a chart. You can use colors to highlight certain aspects. The size of the chart can be adjusted to the used device.

samples.name: Delta Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Shows the Delta Micro Chart within a GenericTile control.

samples.name: Delta Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows a delta micro chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Harvey Ball Micro Chart
samples.description: Displays a HarveyBallMicroChart with highlighted sector. You can use colors to highlight certain aspects. The size of the chart can adjust to the device used.

samples.name: Harvey Ball Micro Chart on a Generic Tile
samples.description: Harvey Ball Micro Chart within a GenericTile.

samples.name: Harvey Ball Micro Chart - Responsiveness
samples.description: Shows Harvey Ball Micro Chart with responsive design.

samples.name: Radial Micro Chart
samples.description: The RadialMicroChart displays a ring chart highlighting a current status. The status is displayed with a semantically colored radial bar and a percentage value. The possible status are neutral, good, critical and error. The chart can be used in different sizes.

samples.name: Radial Micro Chart in Generic Tile
samples.description: The RadialMicroChart control inside of Generic Tile.

samples.name: Micro Charts in Table
samples.description: Shows several microcharts used inside of a Table.
